name: Moo + Hangman
overview: Moo + Hangman is a double games pack that contains the following games: Moo: Based on the board game Mastermind, the idea is to guess a four digit number the computer is thinking off. Once you enter a number, the computer will tell you how many digits are correct and in the right place (Bulls) and how many are correct but in the wrong place (Cows). Hangman: A two player game based on the pen and paper game where one player enters a word and the other player has to guess it. The player guessing enters a letter and if correct then the letter appears in the word and if it is wrong then part of a scaffold appears. After so many guesses and a picture of a scaffold appears with a hanged man, then that player has lost.
developers: P A Vickers and R A Vickers
